content: try out this crochet blood splatter coaster pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/zwlng3ubo5i skill level easy the pattern is worked in one piece format pdf stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn -red -yarn needle -scissors final size -diameter of 10 cm not including the drips
